import React from 'react'; function About() { return ( <>

About me

Hello! I’m Jin, a passionate front-end developer with full-stack knowledge and skills. I enjoy building products that provide exceptional user experience. Most recently, I've worked on e-commence website related to wine retailer.

I'm always trying to grow and learn something new. I lose track of time when I'm hand-lettering, backpacking over mountains, curled up in a good book, or eating food in new countries I explore. Currently, I'm not looking for new opportunities, but I am open to fun side projects. Please don't hesitate to reach out— I'm happy to chat about work or play!

View Resume
); } export default About;
